%mdk-data-line={35}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[96dd964424c9aaa3f1329a5b8c05fa0a]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={37}
(g_1,h_1)+(g_2,h_2) = (g_1+g2 \mathrm{mod} 3, h1+h2 \mathrm{mod} 5).
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d80df8daca17b91b658266cd0106e416]%mdk
$\phi(36)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={113}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ea9886c86ab61cd1cde3f03120be003c]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={115}
36 = 2^2 + 3^2
  = 36(1 - \frac{1}{2}) * (1 - \frac{1}{3})
  = 12 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
